Love the comments. Especially "little kids read Twilight" or whatever that person said. Frankly, your kids are probably better off watching this porn. "Twilight" is about a young girl with no self esteem who falls for (and associates her worth with) two abusive stalkers, then tries to kill herself when one of them breaks up with her until he takes her back and... blah blah blah. The porn is probably just awkward scenes of "acting" before they simply start fucking. Which do YOU think is a better example for your kids?
